title: The Ball and the Cross
description: In this steampunk satire about freedom of speech and religion, two men, a devout Catholic and an atheist, become unwilling allies when they vow to fight a duel to the death over their beliefs, and discover to their astonishment that an unbelieving world won't let them. An abridged reprint of Chesterton's 1909 eerily prophetic novel.
author: G.K. Chesterton
